Data on a group of college students diagnosed with dyslexia

Format

A data frame with 8 observations on the following 7 variables.

words
a numeric vector
age
a numeric vector
gender
a factor with levels f m
handed
a factor with levels l r
weight
a numeric vector
height
a numeric vector
children
a numeric vector
======= A data frame with 8 observations on the following seven variables.
words
number of words read per minute
age
age of participant
gender
a factor with levels female and male
handed
a factor with levels left and right
weight
weight of participant (in pounds)
height
height of participant (in inches)
children
number of children in family

Dyslexia

Data for Exercise 2.90

str(Dyslexia) <<<<<<< HEAD attach(Dyslexia) plot(weight,height) plot(handed,words) detach(Dyslexia)

======= plot(height ~ weight, data = Dyslexia) plot(words ~ handed, data = Dyslexia)
